contact.name: Name
contact.p-3: We'd love to hear from you. Please use the form to send us your message or ideaas. Or simply pop in for a cup of fresh tea and a cookie:

faqs.head: Theme FAQs
faqs.p: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients beforepurchasing the theme. If you have other questions please just send to:

faqs.Q: When can I expect the refund for my online order that was cancelled?
faqs.A: The refund timeline for an online order is 7-14 business days from the date the refund is issued.

faqs.Q: Can I cancel the order once placed, is the refund immediate?
faqs.A: You can cancel the order via the link received in the order confirmation. Alternatively, you can contact us on the toll-free number +1 (090) 123-456 for further assistance.

faqs.Q: How can I use my promo code?
faqs.A: Enter the code exactly as it appears during checkout. NOTE: Your code may have a minimum spend requirement (excluding delivery costs).

faqs.Q: Can I return the items I bought online at one of the stores?
faqs.A: Yes, items bought online or via click-and-collect can be returned at the stores as well. We recommend bringing the receipt as it will facilitate the process. Returns are only possible if the delivery/pickup location is in the same city as the store.

faqs.Q: Can I track my complaint online?
faqs.A: You can contact our customer support team with the complaint reference number and we can assist you further.

faqs.Q: I selected an order address when placing the order, can it be changed now?
faqs.A: We can assist with minor changes to the address, except for the postal code. For further support on this, please call +1 (090) 123-456.

faqs.Q: Can I get help uploading the template?
faqs.A: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select images and text that match your style and story.

faqs.Q: I want to expedite the delivery, is that possible?
faqs.A: Customers cannot advance the delivery date, but they can extend the delivery date based on available slots.

faqs.Q: Can I know the exact time of delivery?
faqs.A: Currently, we do not have the option to select a specific delivery time slot. Transport service providers usually reach out to customers to inform them of the delivery time.

faqs.Q: Can I cancel my order at the time of delivery?
faqs.A: If the service is canceled 24 hours before the scheduled delivery date, we will refund the delivery charges. If there is a specific reason for the cancellation, please reach out to us via call/chat or email for more support.

faqs.Q: How can I check product availability?
faqs.A: We make every effort to maintain product availability, but due to high demand, some items may not always be in stock. You can check availability on the product information pages.

faqs.Q: Do you offer extra or replacement fittings?
Are there any COVID-19 restrictions at your stores right now?
faqs.A: We encourage all customers to follow basic safety measures. The COVID-19 restrictions vary based on the store you are visiting.

faqs.Q: Are your stores open every day?
faqs.A: Yes, our stores are open every day.

faqs.Q: Are pets allowed inside the store?
faqs.A: We love pets, but to avoid any risks, they are not allowed inside the store.
We offer various planning services either online, in-store, or at home, depending on your needs, and we will reach out to you.

faqs.Q: Why are some products out of stock?
faqs.A: Like many retailers, we are facing supply chain challenges due to COVID-19, and as a result, some products may be temporarily unavailable.

about.head: About Us
about.p: CONCEPT is your go-to for makeup, skincare, and beauty essentials—helping everyone, anywhere, define their style.
about.vision: Our vision is to produce and design the most meaningful, beautiful, and affordable products by bringing together good products, people, and value, bringing all the beautiful ideas for real life. The team supports each project with personalized guidance in order to help clients create an entirely bespoke project or furniture pieces according to their needs and, of course, their budget.
about.mission: Build a beautiful home - Build a beautiful planet. We respect our planet. We’re taking positive steps to reduce our impact on the planet. For us, that means retailing responsibly. We’ve set a number of goals to get us there. Things like: eliminating all unnecessary plastic from our product packaging, and ensuring that the most environmentally impactful materials we use are 100% sustainably sourced.
about.quote: “When it comes to your home, we believe you can have it all: great design and quality, at an affordable price. We bring happiness and make your space alive with every design aspect and piece of furniture we create with love.”
about.author: Annie Lee - CEO, Founder at Concept
about.p-1: CONCEPT is the destination for all things home. A place that helps everyone, anywhere, create their feeling of home. We provide well-designed products and solutions for every room in your home. We give you the power to create spaces that are just right for you.
about.p-2: Home is where we started, and it’s our number one priority. We’re experts at getting you the products you want most and are champions for your home needs.
about.p-3: We have the perfect solutions to design and furnish a house, turning it into a genuine home. It manages complete and coordinated interior design projects for residential destinations by manufacturing high-quality furniture, designed and customized on request using specific fabrics, colors, finishes and, most importantly, within their client’s budget.
about.span: This is where comfort and style meet to blissful perfection
